subject: New York City Marathon
Handicapped
lead_paragraph: Halfway through the push-rim wheelchair race, Kurt Fearnley, a 25-year-old Australian, was in the lead and going downhill, when he saw a New York nightmare: three potholes.
snippet: Halfway through the push-rim wheelchair race, Kurt Fearnley, a 25-year-old Australian, was in the lead and going downhill, when he saw a New York nightmare: three potholes.
